203315.en: Oh, hello! You wanted to see me?

203317.en:
Favorite thing? I have many things... but I think I like that one the most... I'm growing a new kind of plant that I found on my
research trip... I'm looking forward to seeing what kind of flower it will bloom... Palmio told me that I can name it after myself when
it blooms... I've decided on ''Hapi Flower'' so that the person who finds this flower will be Happi... I've decided on ''Hapi Flower'' so that
the person who finds this flower will be Happi... isn't that a nice name? I'll grow a lot of flowers and in the future I'll make it
into a big flower field...

203318.en: Want to ask Pekoria what she likes?<yesno><close>

205180.en:
I DID IT, AAAAAAH! I made a new discovery! I'm glad I went
to the trouble of bringing back a specimen!!

205181.en:
Oh, are you a friend of Palmio's? Nice to meet you! I'm Pekoria, the lovely new wife of my husband, the most wonderful man in the world!
If you have any business with Dr. Palmio, he's in the back room... Palmio is a little childish and has some clothes, but he's a
genius doctor... that's his charming gap...
205181.ja:
ã€Œã‚ã‚‰ãƒ¼ã£â™ªã€€ãƒ‘ãƒ«ãƒŸã‚ªã®ã€€ãŠå‹ã ã¡ã§ã™ã‹ãƒ¼ï¼Ÿ ã€€ã†ãµãµã£ã€€ã¯ã˜ã‚ã¾ã—ã¦ï¼ ã€€ã‹ã‚ã„ã„æ–°å¦»ã®ã€€ãƒšã‚³ãƒªã‚¢ã§ãƒ¼ã™ã£â™ª

205182.en:
I DID IT, AAAAAAH! I made a new discovery! This way of
holding a pen doesn't make my shoulders stiff!

205183.en:
<turn_pc>Oops, sorry! You're a customer. If you want my
autograph, you can have as many copies as you
like! What? No?

205184.en:
What the heck is that? A mysterious huge object appeared in Epistesa's bottomless pit! And a mysterious creature has appeared in
Epistesa's bottomless pit? Of course, we'll lend you the key! Here, we have spares! Take as many as you like!

205185.en:
<pc> asked Dr. Palmio for a key to
enter the Miasma Survey Area in the bottomless
pit of Epistesa!

205187.en:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>Correlation between demon miasma and monster.
Is it premature to assume that the mystery
creature is a monster? No, but miasma is.

205188.en:
The ability of that mysterious creature. I can't believe that a creature that can multiply infinitely exists! I mean, it's not a
natural impossibility. mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble.

205189.en:
Palmio and I are talking about having a new
family soon.

205190.en:
The ability of that mysterious creature. I can't believe that a creature that can multiply infinitely exists! I mean, it's not a
natural impossibility. mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble mumble.

205191.en:
Dr. Palmio is absorbed in his research. It is
useless to talk to him now.

205192.en:
I DID IT, AAAAAAH! A new discovery! With this name, my child
will definitely be destined for a Happier
Destiny!

205193.en:
Oh ! It's been a while! What have I been doing? You've listened to me very well! This Palmio is going to be a father! I've
already chosen a name for him! Do you want to hear it? You want to hear it, don't you? The first child of the scientific genius Palmio!
The first child of the genius scientist Palmio, whose name is Pukulas! What's the matter? Is something wrong? You look a little
down. Oh, I see! You were surprised by a better name than you expected, weren't you? I've decided to name it Pukulas, whether it's
a boy or a girl! I'm going to do my best in my research for Pukulas!
205193.ja:

205194.en:
Woohoo... hey, hey... it's amazing... I'm going to be a mother soon... I'm going to make a beautiful family with Palmio... please come
visit me again...

205630.en:
Oops, sorry! You must be a visitor. I just got back from a research trip a few days ago, and I was just classifying the specimens I
collected. This is a wonderful discovery! The vegetation of Lendersia had been thought to be unique, but it exists on other continents! In
other words, there is a possibility that Lendersia and other continents were once one! It's so romantic, isn't it!

205631.en:
I have a feeling that this is a super-sized new discovery! Good thing I came back to Pukuland ah! Ah. If you have the Palmio's Key,
you can enter the Miasma Survey Area, so please go ahead and open the door! There is one thing you should be careful about. That
area is dangerous because of the dense demon miasma that has been spewed from the depths of the earth. I understand your concern about the
mysterious giant object and the new creature, but please turn back immediately if you feel it is dangerous! In our regular surveys every
year, Sage Eidos has cooperated with us in containing the demon miasma so that we can proceed, but this time it is not possible.

205632.en:
Eh? ! You said that Sage Eidos taught you Holy Poetry, which can seal demon miasma, almost immediately? I see, then I can rest assured!
If you can't pass through a place with thick demon miasma, use Holy Poetry to seal the demon miasma as you head toward the depths of
the earth!

205633.en:
Oh, well, it's you, isn't it? If you have the Palmio's Key, you can enter the Miasma Survey Area! If you can't pass through a place where
dense demon miasma is gathering, you should be able to proceed by sealing the demon miasma with the Holy Poetry that Sage Eidos taught
you. The Miasma Survey Area is located in the bottomless pit of Epistesa Hills. You can find the entrance by going down the ladder.

205634.en:
Listen to me! This Palmio is going to be a father! I've already chosen a name for him! The first child of the
scientific genius Palmio! The first child of the genius scientist Palmio! Boy or girl, Pukulas! I'm going to do my best in my
research for Pukulas!
205634.ja:
ã€Œã•ã‚“ã€€èã„ã¦ãã ã•ã„ï¼ ã€€ã“ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ«ãƒŸã‚ªï¼ã€€ãªã‚“ã¨ã€€çˆ¶è¦ªã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ã™ï¼ ã€€ã‚‚ã†ã€€åå‰ã ã£ã¦ã€€æ±ºã‚ã¦ã‚ã‚‹ã‚“ã§ã™ã‚ˆï¼

206025.en:
Let's go to Miasma Survey Area in the
bottomless pit of Epistesa Hills with Palmio's
Key that he gave me.

208252.en:
Of course, Palmio is my favorite one, but if not that, I'm looking forward to seeing what kind of flowers will bloom... Palmio told me
that I can name it ''Hapi Flower'' so that the person who finds this flower will be ''Happi''. I've decided on ''Hapi Flower''... isn't it a
nice name... I'm going to grow a lot of flowers and in the future I'm going to turn it into a big flower field...

211099.en:
In other words, a new organism. Attracted to demon miasma in the depths of the earth? miasma miasma miasma miasma miasma miasma
miasma miasma
